name: Street Club 2
description:
Submission for the retro jam 2021 Console: sega genesis

Game runs at a true resolution of 320x224.

Keys

  • D special punch
  • F punch
  • G jump
  • ArrowKeys move
  • Enter menu accept
Credits: 🖼 Protagonist spritesheet redesign:
  • FloatingTable101
🗺 Map tiles and characters spritesheets (itch.io):
  • chasersgaming
✒ Font (fontspace.com):
  • wepfont: Outrun future
🎵 Music:
  • Inspired from Fight Club's movie songs
🔊Sounds (freesound.org):
  • newagesoup: punch sound
  • Ekokubza123: special punch sound
📺 CRT tv effect (github.com):
  • hiulit
